title: Modern Standardization - Ron Schneiderman
description:
This book includes a collection of IEEE Standards-specific case studies. The case studies offer an opportunity to combine the teaching preferences of educators with the goals of the SEC (Standards Education Committee); providing students with Ã¢â‚¬Å“real-worldÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ insight into the technical, political, and economic arenas of engineering.
